Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Time efficiency to focus on other things. Gave me differing perspectives too. Teacher responses are also shorter/time consuming/restrictive in setting up times. They also cant give as much of an answer as AI but it is more specific given they are marking it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Teacher better as i was ensured i was completing it according to their experienc/the way they would market. I felt much more flexible consulting ai though.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teacher concise yet vague at times. AI not as specific but gives more of an answer/better relevant to me than a tutor who says what they can say (cant say anything hasnt told the cohort has to be fair)
